alert.note: Alert for Mississippi; New Madrid (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 11:16AM CST until March 12 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky...Missouri... Mississippi River at New Madrid. .With runoff from recent heavy rains, the river has risen, and has crested at New Madrid. It will drop below flood stage Saturday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at New Madrid. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 35.0 feet. - Forecast...The river has begun to slowly fall and is projected to fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
